title: why is undertale regarded so highly?
body:
no meming, why do people find undertale so appealing?

rpgs are probably my most favorite and my most played games, I play literally anything with RPG in its genre

i picked up undertale not because of the hype, but because I heard it was based off of some elements from shin megami tensei very shortly undertale came out (didn't even know it was popular)

i can see some reasons of how it stuck in, most notably the soundtrack to which I hum along myself, although the rest of the game while amusing didn't really stick out to me

 yes, even the characters, although they were written nicely they were rather predictable and acted the same in about every situation BARRING genocide route where seeing sans and undyne react to you made me actually feel something (too bad they were the only two serious bosses in the game) 

 i don't care if I'm past the hype train I genuinely want to know, not trying to be a hater either

to make things easier, let me ask you, "why did you like undertale?"

and if you didn't like it tell me that reason too

no memeing please ty gd
